div.pre: 1767 Failaka (anc. Icarus), island in the Persian Gulf off Kuwait, 1960 Burial: 210-200 B.C. Contents: 13 AR, From excavations Imit. Alexander III: 12 tetradr. (from Gerrha?) Antiochus III: 1 tetradr. ( Susa) Disposition: Kuwait MÃ¸rkholm, Kuml 1960, pp. 199-207, illus.
